title: EA Acquires Another Studio, Scarlet Nexus Reviews - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.23.21
description:
Blessing and Andy talk about EA acquiring a studio from Warner, Scarlet Nexus, and a whole bunch of Sonic The Hedgehog.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:40 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Podcast is up where they plan out how to make Greg famous on Tik Tok.
Loki episode 3 impressions just got done recording and will be on Youtube by the time you're listening to this.
Both of those are on Youtube.com/KindaFunny
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:10:55 - EA acquires Playdemic for $1.4bn - Brendan Sinclair @ GiBiz
00:17:40 - Scarlett Nexus review round up
00:27:05 - A new Space Jam game is coming to Xbox Game Pass - Liana Ruppert
00:36:45 - Sonic is coming to Minecraft - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:31:30 - Ad
00:39:15 - Speaking of Sonic: Prepare for a Sonic The Hedgehog Vtuber and maybe even a theme park - Andrew Kiya @ SiliconEra
00:44:50 - Dreams is collaborating with Mercedez Benz for some reason - PS Blog
00:50:38 - Skull Town might be back baby!
00:53:20 - Out today
00:55:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and IGN’s Daemon HatfieldKFGD062321
